title: How powerfull is your PC?
content:
Hey there, i made a little proggy which simulates clouds (lots of them). Im making a High res keen game (not making any promises, but ill do my best to have it finished) and i would like to check how well your PC's cope with all the effects etc.

(You can't enlarge this)
[img]http://www.filelodge.com/files/room15/376446/NewThumb.jpg[/img]

[url=http://www.filelodge.com/files/room15/376446/CPU%20Stress%20Tester%20V3.zip]Download[/url]

If you could post your results (automatically copied to clipboard) that would be great! Thanks.

Here are my results:

Maximum Clouds : 35
REALTIME MAX (20): 3
Pixel Calculations: 293,601,280
Stability Level: 20 %
RAW Speed: 100 %
CPU Cycles: 687
Screen Memory (I): 840 MB

title: Re: How powerfull is your PC?
content:

title: Re: How powerfull is your PC?
content:
This is what happens when your parents decide it's a good idea to buy the cheapest model available from a Gateway store. Integrated graphics card, 1.3 Ghz P4 (the weakest P4 chip ever made, incidentally), and 384 MB of some utterly garbage variety of RAM. At the time, it was a nice step up from the old 100 Mhz Pentium, but it basically dies every time I try to run something made after 2002 at a resolution higher than 640x480.

I'm looking forward to buying a laptop for college immensely.
